trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Emmett
There were no other sightings in Emmett on or around November 30th 2006
Summary: came into the valley, Egg craft
divs: Sighting DetailsI was asking prime creator for proof of existance in meditation. I got up and went outside for a leak as I live up on the south face of the mountain at the 3800 foot level and a Large white glowing egg shaped craft came in from the west and stoped out over the valley. It was there for approxamatly 3 minutes. It then shot of twards the east out of the atmosfear in what looked just like the enterprise in startrak going to warp speed. This year I got ahold of the billy Meire tapes and I think #3 sanje was describeing advanced et civalizations and their craft. She described to the tee what I saw. Mind you I never heard these tapes before this incident. This proves to me that the meire tapes are true.
